name: Smash That Button!
description:
This little game "Smash that button!" was made for a technical test.

It was made using Unity and Playfab for the online leaderboard.

HOW TO PLAY

Just click play, enter your username, get ready and smash the button for 3 seconds.

Your highscore will be recorded and you will get a rank in the leaderboard.

To see your current rank, go back to the menu and click on the yellow trophy to access the leaderboard.
